thread.title: Bungie denies that Destiny pay-to-loot micro-transactions are on the way
thread.title_full: Bungie denies that Destiny pay-to-loot micro-transactions are on the way

title: Bungie denies that Destiny pay-to-loot micro-transactions are on the way
text:
Bungie denies that Destiny pay-to-loot micro-transactions are on the way 
Published By: Lazygamer.net - Today 
Having introduced the Carlton dance and evil hands to the world of Destiny, it looks like more micro-transactions are on the way from Bungie...
